branchCategory.name: C(L)KQG/CLKQP/CLKU
branchCategory.description: <p>Pin clamp cylinder series C(L)KQ series was designed with 4 body types for a broad range of installation conditions.&nbsp; There are 55 types of guide pins available and an optional locking mechanism.&nbsp; C(L)KQ series has positioning and clamping at one time.&nbsp; Precision adjustment of clamping height is possible by choosing the with-shim type.&nbsp; Adjustment range: 0.5 to 3mm.</p>

branchItem.name: C(L)KQG*, Pin Clamp Cylinder, Built-in Standard Magnet
branchItem.description: <p>SMC's pin clamp cylinder with a standard magnet, series C(L)KQ&nbsp;series&nbsp;was designed with 4 body types for a broad range of installation conditions.&nbsp; There are 55 types of guide pins available and an optional locking mechanism.&nbsp; C(L)KQ series has positioning and clamping at one time.&nbsp; Precision adjustment of clamping height is possible by choosing the with-shim type.&nbsp; Adjustment range: 0.5 to 3mm.</p>

branchItem.name: C(L)KQP*, Pin Clamp Cylinder, Built-in Strong Magnet
branchItem.description: <p>SMC's pin clamp cylinder with a weld environment immune magnet, series C(L)KQ series was designed with 4 body types for a broad range of installation conditions.  There are 55 types of guide pins availabe and an optional locking mechanism.  C(L)KQ series has positioning and clamping at one time.  Precision adjustment of clamping height is possible by choosing the with-shim type.  Adjustment range: 0.5 to 3mm.</p>

branchItem.name: C(L)KQG*, Pin Clamp Cylinder, Compact Type
branchItem.description: <p>SMC's compact type pin clamp cylinder with a standard magnet, series C(L)KQ&nbsp;series&nbsp;was designed with 4 body types for a broad range of installation conditions.&nbsp; There are 55 types of guide pins available and an optional locking mechanism.&nbsp; C(L)KQ series&nbsp; has positioning and clamping at one time.&nbsp; Precision adjustment of clamping height is possible by choosing the with-shim type.&nbsp; Adjustment range: 0.5 to 3mm.</p>

branchItem.name: C(L)KU32, Pin Clamp Cylinder, Plate Type
branchItem.description: SMC's pin clamp plate type cylinder with a standard magnet, series C(L)KUQ&nbsp;series&nbsp;was designed with 4 body types for a broad range of installation conditions. Plate type cylinder utilizes an oval piston and allows for closer pin to pin dimensions. Precision adjustment of clamping height is possible by choosing the with-shim type. Adjustment range: 0.5 to 3mm.

branchItem.name: C(L)KU32, Pin Clamp Cylinder, w/Small Auto Switch Mounting, Plate Type
branchItem.description: SMC's pin clamp plate type cylinder with mounting for smaller auto switches, series C(L)KUQ series was designed with 4 body types for a broad range of installation conditions. Plate type cylinder utilizes an oval piston and allows for closer pin to pin dimensions. Precision adjustment of clamping height is possible by choosing the with-shim type. Adjustment range: 0.5 to 3mm.
